title: Mocking Disabled Reporter
summary: Trump mocked New York Times reporter Serge Kovaleski who has arthrogryposis (limits joint movement) by flailing his arms, altering his voice, and contorting his face at a rally.
keyFacts: Mocked reporter Serge Kovaleski who has arthrogryposis
Flailed arms, altered voice, contorted face to imitate disability
Said: 'Now the poor guy, you gotta see this guy'
Falsely claimed not to know Kovaleski despite years of prior interactions
Kovaleski said they had been on 'first-name basis for years'
Bloomberg poll: Voters ranked this Trump's worst offense
